svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Global greenhouse gas emissions (CO₂e) by sector
Breakdown of total global greenhouse gas emissions by sector, measured in gigagrams of carbon-dioxide equivalents
(CO₂e). Carbon dioxide equivalents measures the total greenhouse gas potential of the full combination of gases,
weighted by their relative warming impacts.
Source: UN Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO)
